description: VPS-friendly MCP server registry (harness-native, not Cursor-dependent)

github.note: Set GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN in env to enable

fetch.description: Fetch URLs and extract readable content (Readability-style markdown). Fast-lane alternative to browser for read-only web tasks.

brave-search.description: Brave Search API - structured web and local search results without opening a browser
brave-search.note: Set BRAVE_API_KEY in secrets/brave.env to enable (free tier: 2000 queries/month)

toolhive.note: Set TOOLHIVE_GATEWAY_URL environment variable to enable ToolHive integration
